definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文將通過逐項對比分析，着重闡明二者的對偶性。

sentences.english: Dual-space approach is for multi-target tracking.
sentences.chinese: 面目標跟蹤採用對偶空間轉換算法等方法。

sentences.english: The duality method is used usually in the study of the optimal problem.
sentences.chinese: 如所周知，研究此類差異問題常用的方法是對偶方法。

sentences.english: The dual symmetry of Legendre transformation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 指出熱力學關係具有勒讓德變換的對偶對稱性。

sentences.english: The circuit can restrain odd order harmonic distortion and common model disturbing signal.
sentences.chinese: 該電路具有對偶次諧波及共模干擾信號具有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Every problem has a dual equivalent.
Its dual establishes the equivalence of prime filters and ultrafilters.
sentences.chinese: 它的對偶建立了素濾子和超濾子的等價性。

sentences.english: The duality of multi terminal elements are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中也探討了多端元件的對偶。

sentences.english: Researches indicate that dual kriging is a helpful form.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，克里金法的對偶形是一種有用的形式。

sentences.english: First, measurability of the mappings which are related to the dual semigroup of the linear system is established.
sentences.chinese: 首先建立了一個同對偶半羣有關的映射的可測性。

sentences.english: Thereby, the advancement of duality theories is a big milestone in functional analysis.
sentences.chinese: 從而對偶理論的引入是泛函分析中的一次偉大轉折。

sentences.english: A primal problem that has no solution has an unbounded dual problem.
sentences.chinese: 無解的原始問題就會有一個無界的對偶問題。

sentences.english: There is no interaction of non-allelic genes in the experiment conducted.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗中，非對偶基因並無交互作用。

sentences.english: Frequency of compound heterozygosity was similar in both groups.
sentences.chinese: 兩組的對偶基因爲異型合子的發生頻率則相似。

sentences.english: This paper constructs a family of compactly supported interpolating wavelets with compactly supported duals.
sentences.chinese: 本文構造了具有緊支撐對偶的內插子波。

sentences.english: Both the dual and complement of such functions are also threshold function .
sentences.chinese: 一個函數的對偶及都是臨界值函數。

definition: interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched/roughly comparable (opponents)
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
